name: Summer Fun (andrecraft GAMES)
description:
It's another summer at a late time, how about we make this one stand out?

Play as Alucard through this short version of the game with 2 levels and a time trial

Summer Fun is made for the 32bit Jam 2022, it's my first released game, it took 6 days to finish it, hope you like it
my Discord Server invite link: https://discord.gg/UCu9nGZjCS
